pageContext.claim: “We're getting out of the endless wars. We have to do it. And eventually somebody was going to have to make the decision. And, frankly, we're getting a lot of praise from that decision. We -- people are saying, 'Got to sometime bring our people back home.' We're really serving and we were serving as a police force.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's decision to allow Turkey to invade areas of Syria held the U.S. Kurdish allies has been widely criticized, especially by Republicans.
